name: Fish RPG: The Can
description:
This is my first project I put on Itch.io, so I hope you like it. I created this with Scratch, which doesn't require code, so it might be a bit bad. 

INSTRUCTIONS

Click on settings to turn off ANNOYING SHARK, which is really annoying pls turn it off.  Click play to... well... play. When you finish the beginning(that is the only cut scene so I made the first one long) Click on the attacks in the attack box to attack). Hover over the attacks to see their abilities and how much energy they cost. Also, wait 3 seconds after you see that you took damage cause I forgot how to put a turn indicator in the game.

NOTE:

The health, enemy health, and energy are all gone at the beginning, so you have to do an attack and wait to take damage for the stuff to appear.
